entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 a.m. MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 6:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
